title: Internship
content: Hey is this internship open to sem 2 students too? There were no contact details for queries so my friend told me to ask here.

comments.body: The tentative interview list does have a couple first years but assuming you haven't applied yet and therefore don't know, the last date for applications was yesterday
Oh right thanks. I was asking for a friend

So you were asking for a friend and another friend asked you to ask here
